biotools.summary:
Automated joint skull-stripping and segmentation with Multi-Task U-Net in large mouse brain MRI databases.

Multi-task U-Net for the simultaneous segmentation and skull-stripping of mouse brain MRI This convolutional neural network is designed to perform skull-stripping and region segmentation on mouse brain MRI. A jupyter notebook going over the deails of this project and the training procedure is available here.

bioschemas.name: MU-Net
